title: Nalda
description: Web app for a centralized source of information on fun, food, and activities on college campuses. We paired with a Penn startup to build this using a React/Redux, Express, MongoDB, and Node stack.

title: The Metric
description: Web app for a student-run organization that publishes domestic policy, foreign policy, and current affairs-related content from across the world. This was built using Ruby on Rails and PostgreSQL.

title: YouthHack
description: Website for an international organization dedicated to cultivating student entrepreneurship. We utilized HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, and Javascript while building this site.
